event.logging

Interface LoggedWorkExceptionHandler<A extends EventAction>


  • public interface LoggedWorkExceptionHandler<A extends EventAction>

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      A handle(A eventAction, java.lang.Throwable throwable)
      A handler to provide a new EventAction based on the Throwable and the original EventAction, e.g.

    • Method Detail

      • handle

        A handle(A eventAction,
         java.lang.Throwable throwable)
        A handler to provide a new EventAction based on the Throwable and the original EventAction, e.g. where you need to add more detail to the EventAction based on the work performed and the exception thrown.
        Parameters:
        eventAction - The original EventAction for the logged work.
        throwable - The Throwable thrown by the logged work.
        Returns:
        A new EventAction for use in the logged event.
